refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: urfkill provides an interface to enumerate rfkill switches on the system and control system-wide rfkill switches management. Any application can access the org.freedesktop.URfkill service on the system message bus. Some operations (such as setting soft block on the device) is restricted using PolicyKit.
